location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 11: James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, informs William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, that he has forwarded a packet which was received at Bushire from His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires at Tabrize [Tabrīz], Henry Willock.
